QuestData.Title: The Headmistress' Keys
QuestData.Description: I have a suspicion you are avoiding your studies - but I can see you're anxious to see the Headmistress.$b$bVery well! Headmistress Azuremoon can be found up ahead, though I doubt she will enjoy being interrupted.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain the Tidestone Vault Key from Elya Azuremoon, the Academy Headmistress.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to meet with the headmistress?
QuestData.RewardText: She... she gave you her key? My word!
